patthana16.20:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati
patthana16.20:1.1_1: hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nacittasamuṭṭhāno
patthana16.20:1.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo
patthana16.20:1.1_3: nacittasamuṭṭhāno ca naabyākato nacittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.20:2.1_0: Akusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati
patthana16.20:2.1_1: hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nacittasamuṭṭhāno
patthana16.20:2.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
patthana16.20:2.1_3: nacittasamuṭṭhāno ca naabyākato nacittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.20:3.1: Abyākataṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.20:4.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana16.20:5.1: Kusalaṁ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.20:6.1: Akusalaṁ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nanocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.20:7.1: Abyākataṁ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.20:8.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
